member.name: T:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldData
member.summary: Models a single custom field on a card.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldData.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the field.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldData.Type
member.summary: Gets the intended data type of the field.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldData.Value
member.summary: Gets the value in the field. Check the property for the intended data type.
member.remarks: Values for drop-down lists will be the index in the list, not the textual value. To get the text value, check the for the options.

member.name: M:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldData.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldDefinition
member.summary: Defines meta-data for a single custom field.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldDefinition.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the field.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldDefinition.Type
member.summary: Gets the intended data type of the field. Data will be string-encoded.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldDefinition.ShowBadge
member.summary: Gets whether the field is configured to appear on the card cover as a badge.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.CustomFieldDefinition.DropdownOptions
member.summary: Gets the drop-down options. Only available for drop-down field types.

member.param: The board that defines the fields.

member.name: T:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.FieldType
member.summary: Defines intended data types for custom fields. Custom field data is always string-encoded.

member.name: F:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.FieldType.Unknown
member.summary: Specifies an unknown type.

member.name: F:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.FieldType.Text
member.summary: Specifies that data is a string.

member.name: F:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.FieldType.Number
member.summary: Specifies that data is a number.

member.name: F:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.FieldType.Checkbox
member.summary: Specifies that data is a checkbox (boolean).

member.name: F:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.FieldType.Date
member.summary: Specifies that data is a date.

member.name: F:Manatee.Trello.CustomFields.FieldType.Dropdown
member.summary: Specifies that data is one of a collection of predefined text values.
